libraries.name: AccelStepper
libraries.author: Mike McCauley
libraries.sentence: AccelStepper library provides an object-oriented interface for 2, 3 or 4 pin stepper motors
libraries.paragraph: AccelStepper library provides an object-oriented interface for 2, 3 or 4 pin stepper motors

libraries.name: Bounce2
libraries.author: Thomas O Fredericks
libraries.sentence: Debouncing library for Arduino and Wiring
libraries.paragraph: Deboucing switches and toggles is important

libraries.name: Debounce
libraries.author: Thomas Ouellet Fredericks
libraries.sentence: Debounce library debounces digital inputs
libraries.paragraph: Debounce library debounces digital inputs

libraries.name: DHT
libraries.author: Adafruit
libraries.sentence: Arduino library for DHT11, DHT22, etc Temp & Humidity Sensors
libraries.paragraph: Arduino library for DHT11, DHT22, etc Temp & Humidity Sensors

libraries.name: ESP8266
libraries.author: Wu Pengfei
libraries.sentence: ESP8266 offers a complete and self-contained Wi-Fi networking solution, allowing it to either host the application or to offload all Wi-Fi networking functions from another application processor

libraries.name: HttpClient
libraries.author: Adrian McEwen
libraries.sentence: Library to easily make HTTP GET, POST and PUT requests to a web server
libraries.paragraph: Works with any class derived from Client - so switching between Ethernet, WiFi and GSMClient requires minimal code changes

libraries.name: Keypad
libraries.author: Mark Stanley, Alexander Brevig
libraries.sentence: Keypad is a library for using matrix style keypads with the 86Duino
libraries.paragraph: Keypad is a library for using matrix style keypads with the 86Duino

libraries.name: LedControl
libraries.author: Eberhard Fahle
libraries.sentence: A library for the MAX7219 and the MAX7221 Led display drivers
libraries.paragraph: The library supports multiple daisychained drivers and supports Led-Matrix displays as well as 7-Segment displays

libraries.name: LiquidCrystal_I2C
libraries.author: Frank de Brabander
libraries.sentence: A library for I2C LCD displays.
libraries.paragraph: The library allows to control I2C displays with functions extremely similar to LiquidCrystal library. THIS LIBRARY MIGHT NOT BE COMPATIBLE WITH EXISTING SKETCHES.

libraries.name: Matrix
libraries.author: Adafruit
libraries.sentence: The Matrix library allows you to control a large number of LEDs, with easy-to-use (but expensive) MAX7219 chips. Sprite is used with Matrix, to draw shapes
libraries.paragraph: The Matrix library allows you to control a large number of LEDs, with easy-to-use (but expensive) MAX7219 chips. Sprite is used with Matrix, to draw shapes

libraries.name: Messenger
libraries.author: Thomas Ouellet Fredericks
libraries.sentence: Messenger is a toolkit that facilitates the parsing of ASCII messages
libraries.paragraph: Messenger buffers characters until it receives a carriage return (CR). It then considers the message complete and available. The message is split into many elements as defined by a separator. The default separator is the space character, but can be any character other than NULL, LF or CR

libraries.name: ModbusTCP
libraries.author: Dee Wykoff and Martin Pettersson
libraries.sentence: A Modbus TCP class for Arduino and either Ethernet or Adafruit CC3000 WiFi shield that includes support for 32-bit integer and float operations
libraries.paragraph: A Modbus TCP class for Arduino and either Ethernet or Adafruit CC3000 WiFi shield that includes support for 32-bit integer and float operations

libraries.name: PS2X_lib
libraries.author: Bill Porter
libraries.sentence: A fork of the PS2X library to access a Playstation 2 controller on 86Duino
libraries.paragraph: A fork of the PS2X library to access a Playstation 2 controller on 86Duino

libraries.name: Psx
libraries.author: Arduino
libraries.sentence: PSX library allows an 86Duino to interface with a standard digital Playstation 1 controller
libraries.paragraph: PSX library allows an 86Duino to interface with a standard digital Playstation 1 controller

libraries.name: RTClib
libraries.author: Adafruit
libraries.sentence: Library offering support for uStepper
libraries.paragraph: Timer support library

libraries.name: SimpleMessageSystem
libraries.author: Arduino
libraries.sentence: SimpleMessageSystem library facilitates communication with terminals or message based programs like Pure Data or Max/Msp
libraries.paragraph: All Serial input and output will be made and interpreted as ASCII characters

libraries.name: SpiderL3S
libraries.author: yljhao
libraries.sentence: SpiderL3S library porting from CC3000 host driver, which works with Spider_L3S WiFi module
libraries.paragraph: SpiderL3S library porting from CC3000 host driver, which works with Spider_L3S WiFi module

libraries.name: ThingSpeak
libraries.author: MathWorks
libraries.sentence: ThingSpeak Communication Library for 86Duino
libraries.paragraph: ThingSpeak is a free IoT service for building systems that collect, analyze, and react to their environments

libraries.name: TinyGPS
libraries.author: Mikal Hart
libraries.sentence: A compact GPS parsing library
libraries.paragraph: A compact GPS parsing library

libraries.name: Twitter
libraries.author: NeoCat <neocat@neocat.jp>
libraries.sentence: Twitter Library is a library for 86Duino to tweet on Twitter
libraries.paragraph: It is convenient to making a bot for Twitter which posts messages automatically from various sensors

libraries.name: USB Host Shield Library 2.0
libraries.author: Oleg Mazurov (Circuits@Home) <mazurov@circuitsathome.com>, Kristian Lauszus (TKJ Electronics) <kristianl@tkjelectronics.com>, Andrew Kroll <xxxajk@gmail.com>, Alexei Glushchenko (Circuits@Home) <alex-gl@mail.ru>
libraries.maintainer: Oleg Mazurov (Circuits@Home) <mazurov@circuitsathome.com>, Kristian Lauszus (TKJ Electronics) <kristianl@tkjelectronics.com>, Andrew Kroll <xxxajk@gmail.com>
libraries.sentence: Revision 2.0 of MAX3421E-based USB Host Shield Library
libraries.paragraph: Supports HID devices, FTDI, ADK, ACM, PL2303, Bluetooth HID devices, SPP communication and mass storage devices. Furthermore it supports PS3, PS4, PS Buzz, Wii and Xbox controllers

libraries.name: Webduino
libraries.author: Ben Combee, Ran Talbott, Christopher Lee, Martin Lormes Francisco M Cuenca-Acuna
libraries.maintainer: Ben Combee, Ran Talbott, Christopher Lee, Martin Lormes Francisco M Cuenca-Acuna
libraries.sentence: This is an Arduino-based Web Server library, originally developed for a class at NYC Resistor. It's called Webduino, and it's an extensible web server library for the 86Duino
libraries.paragraph: This is an Arduino-based Web Server library, originally developed for a class at NYC Resistor. It's called Webduino, and it's an extensible web server library for the 86Duino

libraries.name: xbee
libraries.author: Andrew Rapp
libraries.sentence: Library for talking to to various wireless XBee modules from Digi
libraries.paragraph: This supports various devices, configured to use the more advanced API mode

libraries.name: xively
libraries.author: Arduino
libraries.sentence: Xively_arduino library for 86Duino to make it easier to talk to Xively
libraries.paragraph: Xively_arduino library for 86Duino to make it easier to talk to Xively

libraries.name: PubSubClient
libraries.author: Nick O'Leary <nick.oleary@gmail.com>
libraries.sentence: A client library for MQTT messaging.
libraries.paragraph: MQTT is a lightweight messaging protocol ideal for small devices. This library allows you to send and receive MQTT messages. It supports the latest MQTT 3.1.1 protocol and can be configured to use the older MQTT 3.1 if needed. It supports all Arduino Ethernet Client compatible hardware, including the Intel Galileo/Edison, ESP8266 and TI CC3000.

libraries.name: Protothreads
libraries.author: Ben Artin <ben@artins.org>,Adam Dunkels
libraries.sentence: A lightweight stackless threads library
libraries.paragraph: Protothreads provide linear code execution for event-driven systems. Protothreads provide sequential flow of control without complex state machines or full multi-threading.

libraries.name: Adafruit SSD1306
libraries.author: Adafruit
libraries.sentence: SSD1306 oled driver library for monochrome 128x64 and 128x32 displays
libraries.paragraph: SSD1306 oled driver library for monochrome 128x64 and 128x32 displays

libraries.name: Adafruit SSD1306
libraries.author: Adafruit
libraries.sentence: SSD1306 oled driver library for monochrome 128x64 and 128x32 displays
libraries.paragraph: SSD1306 oled driver library for monochrome 128x64 and 128x32 displays

libraries.author: Adafruit
libraries.sentence: SSD1306 oled driver library for monochrome 128x64 and 128x32 displays
libraries.paragraph: SSD1306 oled driver library for monochrome 128x64 and 128x32 displays

libraries.author: Adafruit
libraries.sentence: SSD1306 oled driver library for monochrome 128x64 and 128x32 displays

libraries.name: Adafruit MLX90614 Library
libraries.author: Adafruit
libraries.sentence: Arduino library for the MLX90614 sensors in the Adafruit shop
libraries.paragraph: Arduino library for the MLX90614 sensors in the Adafruit shop

libraries.name: SparkFun ISL29125 Breakout
libraries.author: SparkFun Electronics <techsupport@sparkfun.com>
libraries.sentence: Arduino library showing basic functionality for the ISL29125 RGB Light Sensor Breakout Board.
libraries.paragraph: The ISL29125 breakout board makes it very easy to sense and record the light intensity of the general red, green, and blue spectrums of visible light while rejecting IR from light sources.

libraries.name: SparkFun MS5803-14BA Pressure Sensor
libraries.author: Casey@SparkFun Electronics <techsupport@sparkfun.com>
libraries.sentence: Library for MS5803-14BA Pressure Sensor.
libraries.paragraph: Provides I2C communication protocol for measuring wather depth, altitude, or other pressure readings.

libraries.name: SparkFun BME280
libraries.author: SparkFun Electronics
libraries.sentence: A library to drive the Bosch BME280 Altimeter and Pressure sensor
libraries.paragraph: The SparkFun CCS811/BME280 Environmental Combo Breakout takes care of all your atmospheric-quality sensing needs with the popular CCS811 and BME280 ICs. This unique breakout provides a variety of environmental data, including barometric pressure, humidity, temperature, TVOCs and equivalent CO2 (or eCO2) levels.

libraries.name: SparkFun TSL2561
libraries.author: Mike Grusin@SparkFun Electronics <techsupport@sparkfun.com>
libraries.sentence: An Arduino Library for the TSL2561 Luminosity Sensor Breakout from SparkFun Electronics.
libraries.paragraph: Via I2C communication, the sensor conducts specific light ranges from 0.1-40k+ Lux.

libraries.name: TaskScheduler
libraries.author: Anatoli Arkhipenko <arkhipenko@hotmail.com>
libraries.sentence: Cooperative multitasking for Arduino, ESPx, STM32 and other microcontrollers.
libraries.paragraph: Supports: periodic task execution (with dynamic execution period in milliseconds or microseconds – frequency of execution), number of iterations (limited or infinite number of iterations), execution of tasks in predefined sequence, dynamic change of task execution parameters (frequency, number of iterations, callback methods), power saving via entering IDLE sleep mode when tasks are not scheduled to run, event-driven task invocation via Status Request object, task IDs and Control Points for error handling and watchdog timer, Local Task Storage pointer (allowing use of same callback code for multiple tasks), layered task prioritization, std::functions (esp8266, esp32 only), overall task timeout, static and dynamic callback method binding.

libraries.name: Adafruit TCS34725
libraries.author: Adafruit
libraries.sentence: Driver for Adafruit's TCS34725 RGB Color Sensor Breakout
libraries.paragraph: Driver for Adafruit's TCS34725 RGB Color Sensor Breakout

libraries.name: STM32duino LSM6DSOX
libraries.author: SRA
libraries.sentence: Ultra Low Power inertial measurement unit.
libraries.paragraph: This library provides Arduino support for the Ultra Low Power LSM6DSOX for STM32 boards.

libraries.name: Lime Labs HDC2080
libraries.author: Lime Labs GmbH, Texas Instruments, TinkeringTech, @stickbreaker
libraries.sentence: An Arduino library to configure and communicate with the Texas Instruments HDC2080 temperature & humidity sensor
libraries.paragraph: Uses I2C and the Arduino Wire library to communicate with the HDC2080

libraries.name: BH1750
libraries.author: Christopher Laws
libraries.sentence: Arduino library for the digital light sensor breakout boards containing the BH1750FVI IC
libraries.paragraph: Pretty simple and robust BH1750 library. Arduino, ESP8266 & ESP32 compatible.

libraries.name: DallasTemperature
libraries.author: Miles Burton <miles@mnetcs.com>, Tim Newsome <nuisance@casualhacker.net>, Guil Barros <gfbarros@bappos.com>, Rob Tillaart <rob.tillaart@gmail.com>
libraries.sentence: Arduino Library for Dallas Temperature ICs
libraries.paragraph: Supports DS18B20, DS18S20, DS1822, DS1820

libraries.name: Bolder Flight Systems MPU9250
libraries.author: Brian Taylor <brian.taylor@bolderflight.com>
libraries.sentence: Library for communicating with the MPU-9250 and MPU-9255 nine-axis Inertial Measurement Units (IMU).
libraries.paragraph: This library supports both I2C and SPI communication with the MPU-9250. The MPU9250 object declaration is overloaded with different declarations for I2C and SPI communication. All other functions remain the same. Additionally, a derived class, MPU250FIFO, is included, which provides FIFO setup and data collection functionality in addition to all of the functionality included in the base MPU9250 class.

libraries.name: MPU9250
libraries.author: hideakitai
libraries.sentence: Arduino library for MPU9250 Nine-Axis (Gyro + Accelerometer + Compass) MEMS MotionTracking™ Device
libraries.paragraph: Arduino library for MPU9250 Nine-Axis (Gyro + Accelerometer + Compass) MEMS MotionTracking™ Device

libraries.name: NeoNextion
libraries.author: Dan Nixon
libraries.sentence: Arduino library for controlling Nextion displays
libraries.paragraph: Arduino library for controlling Nextion displays

libraries.name: MS5xxx
libraries.author: Roman Schmitz <roman@schmitzi.net>
libraries.sentence: Library for digital pressure sensors MS5xxx by Measurement Specialties (MEAS).
libraries.paragraph: Tested with Arduino Uno/Nano/Mico and ESP8266. Long-term tests with MS5607, working implementation for MS5611 chipset.
